img.alt: How are we doing in response to COVID-19?

strong.img: How are we doing in response to COVID-19? Please share your anonymous thoughts HERE. Check back frequently and rate others' responses. Deadline is Thursday, April 30.

span.strong: MVCSC Out-of-District Transfer Application (4/18-4/26 and 5/9-5/17) applies to all current and interested out-of-district/transfer students.

p.span: School Board Meeting Public Comment: Meetings are televised on the MVCSC's YouTube Channel linked HERE.
For those who which to participate by providing public comment on agenda items:
Type “Public Comment - 4/13/2020” in the email title
Provide in your email your first and last name and address in the text of the email
Include your public comment in the text of the email
We will pause 5 minutes to allow public comment.

strong.span: MVCSC Health Services has a handbook that has details regarding transporting medication for students.
